duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop Financial Need Analysis (FNA) for Clients
Place families, individuals, and business owners in a financial position of advantage for various financial scenarios
Analyze market trends and client financial behavior to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies
Manage the company's online presence and communication with clients through various communication channels.
Plan and oversee daily prospecting and lead generation activities

education_certification.credential: Life & Health License (able to study and pass for any state residing in)
